text: Andrei Denisov (; born June 3, 1963) is an Israeli Olympic weightlifter. Denisov is Jewish. When he competed in the Olympics, he weighed 209 lbs (95 kg). Denisov competed for Israel at the 1992 Summer Olympics at the age of 29 in Barcelona, Spain, in Weightlifting—Men's Heavyweight (100 kg), and came in 6th, lifting 377.5 kg. He lifted 386 pounds (175.0 kg) in the snatch, and 446 pounds (202.5 kg) in the clean and jerk, coming short of a medal by 50 pounds (22.5 kg). ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli Jews Category:Jewish weightlifters Category:Israeli male weightlifters Category:Weightlifters at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic weightlifters of Israel
title: Andrei Denisov (weightlifter)
